Content:
# FaceLift: Learning Generalizable Single Image 3D Face Reconstruction from Synthetic Heads ### 🌺ICCV 2025🌺 [Weijie Lyu](https://weijielyu.github.io/), [Yi Zhou](https://zhouyisjtu.github.io/), [Ming-Hsuan Yang](https://faculty.ucmerced.edu/mhyang/), [Zhixin Shu](https://zhixinshu.github.io/)
University of California, Merced - Adobe Research [![Website](https://img.shields.io/badge/Website-FaceLift?logo=googlechrome&logoColor=hsl(204%2C%2086%25%2C%2053%25)&label=FaceLift&labelColor=%23f5f5dc&color=hsl(204%2C%2086%25%2C%2053%25))](https://weijielyu.github.io/FaceLift) [![Paper](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paper-arXiv?logo=arxiv&logoColor=%23B31B1B&label=arXiv&labelColor=%23f5f5dc&color=%23B31B1B)](https://arxiv.org/abs/2412.17812) [![Video](https://img.shields.io/badge/Video-YouTube?logo=youtube&logoColor=%23FF0000&label=YouTube&labelColor=%23f5f5dc&color=%23FF0000)](https://youtu.be/lf0Gck9UOcU)
> *FaceLift* transforms a single facial image into a high-fidelity 3D Gaussian head representation, and it generalizes remarkably well to real-world human images. This is a self-reimplementation of *FaceLift*. Codes will be released soon. In the meantime, if you'd like to try *FaceLift* with your own images, feel free to email them to wlyu3@ucmerced.edu. We'll process them and send the results back to you. ## Citation If you find our work useful for your project, please consider citing our paper.
Translation:
# FaceLift: Aprendizaje de Reconstrucción 3D Generalizable de Rostros a partir de una Sola Imagen Sintética de Cabezas ### 🌺ICCV 2025🌺 [Weijie Lyu](https://weijielyu.github.io/), [Yi Zhou](https://zhouyisjtu.github.io/), [Ming-Hsuan Yang](https://faculty.ucmerced.edu/mhyang/), [Zhixin Shu](https://zhixinshu.github.io/)
Universidad de California, Merced - Adobe Research [![Website](https://img.shields.io/badge/Website-FaceLift?logo=googlechrome&logoColor=hsl(204%2C%2086%25%2C%2053%25)&label=FaceLift&labelColor=%23f5f5dc&color=hsl(204%2C%2086%25%2C%2053%25))](https://weijielyu.github.io/FaceLift) [![Paper](https://img.shields.io/badge/Paper-arXiv?logo=arxiv&logoColor=%23B31B1B&label=arXiv&labelColor=%23f5f5dc&color=%23B31B1B)](https://arxiv.org/abs/2412.17812) [![Video](https://img.shields.io/badge/Video-YouTube?logo=youtube&logoColor=%23FF0000&label=YouTube&labelColor=%23f5f5dc&color=%23FF0000)](https://youtu.be/lf0Gck9UOcU)
> *FaceLift* transforma una sola imagen facial en una representación 3D de cabeza Gaussiana de alta fidelidad, y generaliza de manera notable a imágenes humanas del mundo real. Esta es una reimplementación propia de *FaceLift*. Los códigos serán liberados pronto. Mientras tanto, si deseas probar *FaceLift* con tus propias imágenes, no dudes en enviarlas por correo a wlyu3@ucmerced.edu. Nosotros las procesaremos y te enviaremos los resultados. ## Citación Si encuentras útil nuestro trabajo para tu proyecto, por favor considera citar nuestro artículo.

RowTranslations.originContent: # FaceLift: Learning Generalizable Single Image 3D Face Reconstruction from Synthetic Heads
RowTranslations.translatedContent: # FaceLift: Aprendizaje de Reconstrucción 3D Generalizable de Rostros a partir de una Sola Imagen Sintética de Cabezas

RowTranslations.originContent: University of California, Merced - Adobe Research
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Universidad de California, Merced - Adobe Research

RowTranslations.originContent: > *FaceLift* transforms a single facial image into a high-fidelity 3D Gaussian head representation, and it generalizes remarkably well to real-world human images.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: > *FaceLift* transforma una sola imagen facial en una representación 3D de cabeza Gaussiana de alta fidelidad, y generaliza de manera notable a imágenes humanas del mundo real.

RowTranslations.originContent: This is a self-reimplementation of *FaceLift*. Codes will be released soon.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Esta es una reimplementación propia de *FaceLift*. Los códigos serán liberados pronto.

RowTranslations.originContent: In the meantime, if you'd like to try *FaceLift* with your own images, feel free to email them to wlyu3@ucmerced.edu. We'll process them and send the results back to you.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Mientras tanto, si deseas probar *FaceLift* con tus propias imágenes, no dudes en enviarlas por correo a wlyu3@ucmerced.edu. Nosotros las procesaremos y te enviaremos los resultados.

RowTranslations.originContent: If you find our work useful for your project, please consider citing our paper.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Si encuentras útil nuestro trabajo para tu proyecto, por favor considera citar nuestro artículo.
